products.title: Caizilan Sleep Spray Relaxing Bedroom & Travel Mist for Calm and Restful Sleep
products.body_html:
Caizilan Sleep Spray Relaxing Bedroom & Travel Mist for Calm and Restful Sleep

Promote restful sleep and relaxation with the Caizilan Sleep Spray. Designed for universal use, this gentle mist helps calm your senses, refresh linens, and create a soothing environment at home or while traveling. Perfect for bedroom, office, or travel use, it’s your go-to solution for peaceful nights.

How to Use:

  1. Shake the bottle gently.

  2. Spray lightly on pillows, linens, or around your room.

  3. Enjoy a relaxing and calming effect for better sleep.

Specifications:

  • Size: 20ml

  • Applicable Skin Type: Universal

  • Use Cases: Bedroom, Travel, Office

Why You’ll Love It:

products.title: Docteat Boost Sleep Spray Natural Sleep Aid with Herbal Extracts for Relaxation & Comfort Sleep
products.body_html:
Docteat Boost Sleep Spray Natural Sleep Aid with Herbal Extracts for Relaxation & Comfort Sleep

The Docteat Boost Sleep Spray is a natural sleep aid formulated with traditional Chinese medicine extracts, mint leaf, vitamin B1, and gluconic acid lactone. Designed to help you relax, reduce stress, and improve sleep quality, this convenient spray promotes deeper, restful nights. Ideal for home use or travel, it supports your bedtime routine with a natural, gentle approach.

Key Features:

  • Natural sleep aid with herbal and Chinese medicine extracts

  • Contains mint leaf extract for a calming effect

  • Enriched with vitamin B1 and gluconic acid lactone

  • Easy-to-use spray for quick and convenient application

  • Supports relaxation and promotes restful sleep

How to Use:

  • Shake well before use

  • Spray 2–3 times on your pillow or around your sleeping area

  • Inhale gently and relax to enjoy a restful night

Specifications:

  • Type: Boost Sleep Spray

  • Brand: Docteat

  • Ingredients: Traditional Chinese medicine extract, gluconic acid lactone, vitamin B1, potassium sorbate, mint leaf extract

  • Use: Sleep aid, relaxation, bedtime routine

  • Design: Portable, easy-to-use spray bottle

Why You'll Love It:

  • Natural ingredients for safe and gentle sleep support

  • Helps reduce stress and calm the mind

  • Convenient spray for home or travel

  • Promotes deeper, uninterrupted sleep

  • Supports overall relaxation and bedtime routine

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Docteat Boost Sleep Spray

products.title: Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Humidifier Machine for Home Relaxation & Comfort
products.body_html:
Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Humidifier Machine for Home Relaxation & Comfort

Transform your home into a calm and soothing sanctuary with the Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Machine. Combining white noise, aromatherapy, and flame simulation, this device is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or small offices. It helps create a relaxing environment for sleep, meditation, or stress relief.

Featuring a quiet operation below 36dB and a mechanical control system, the Elaral aromatherapy machine is easy to use and safe. Its USB power mode ensures convenience, while the 0.5L water tank and single fog outlet provide a gentle and consistent mist for small spaces.

Key Features:

  • White Noise Simulation: Enhances relaxation and improves sleep quality.

  • Flame & Aromatherapy Effect: Creates a cozy and calming ambiance.

  • USB Power Mode: Convenient and energy-efficient operation.

  • Quiet & Efficient: Noise below 36dB, ideal for bedrooms and offices.

  • Compact Design: Fits rooms from 21–30 ㎡, lightweight and stylish.

Specifications:

  • Power Mode: USB

  • Applicable Area: 21–30 ㎡

  • Shape: Square

  • Noise Level: <36dB

  • Timing Function: Up to 2 hours

  • Water Tank Capacity: ≤0.5L

  • Operation Mode: Mechanical

  • Number of Fog Outlets: 1

  • Rated Power: 6W

  • Color: White Noise (English)

  • Shell Material: ABS mute

  • Fog Type: Mist

  • Capacity: 200mL

  • Size: 200 × 130 × 90 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Combines aromatherapy, white noise, and flame simulation for relaxation
✔ USB-powered for convenience and energy efficiency
✔ Quiet operation ideal for sleep, meditation, or work
✔ Compact, stylish, and suitable for small household spaces
✔ Simple mechanical operation for easy use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Elaral White Noise Simulation Flame Aromatherapy Machine
